author: Human Connectome Project
cite: Glasser M. F., Sotiropoulos S. N., Wilson J. A., Coalson T. S., Fischl B., Andersson J. L., … Consortium, W. U.-M. H. (2013). The minimal preprocessing pipelines for the Human Connectome Project. NeuroImage, 80, 105–124.

aseg_csv.description: Write aseg stats to a csv file and analysis metadata.

avgrdcmethod_struct.description: Select distortion correction method that corresponds with the types of collected fieldmaps. GE fieldmaps not currently supported.

bias_correction_func.description: Bias-field estimation method. 'NONE'(default),'SEBASED', or 'Legacy'. 'SEBASED'=Estimate from SpinEchoFieldMap (only possible with both Pos and Neg SpinEcho), 'Legacy'=Estimate from structural scans (only valid if structural collected in the same session, and without any subject movement)

brain_size.description: Brain size in mm (in Superior-Inferior axis), typically 150 (default) for adults

debug.description: Add additional debug level messages to log output?

dof_diff.description: Degrees of freedom for Diffusion->Anat registration. 6 (default) = rigid body, when all data is from same scanner. 12 = full affine, recommended for 7T fMRI->3T anatomy

dof_func.description: Degrees of freedom for fMRI->Anat registration. 6 (default) = rigid body, when all data is from same scanner. 12 = full affine, recommended for 7T fMRI->3T anatomy

dwi_name_out.description: Output name for preprocessed data. *Note: Spaces will be replaced with '_'.

gear_abort_on_bids_error.description: Terminate gear if BIDS errors are encountered. (No output will be generated.)

gear_dry_run.description: Log all commands, but do not execute.

gear_run_bids_validation.description: Run BIDS validator prior to attempting analysis.

gear_save_on_error.description: Set to 'True' to save output on error.

mctype_func.description: Motion correction algorithm. Use 'MCFLIRT' (standard FSL moco) for most acquisitions.  'FLIRT'=custom algorithm used by HCP3T internally, but not recommended for public use

reg_name.description: Surface registration type: either 'FS' (freesurfer) or 'MSMSulc' (HCP default)

run_label.description: [RUN_LABEL [RUN_LABEL ...]] Do not include 'run-', when listing the specific task to include. If left blank, will analyze all runs.

session_label.description: [SESSION_LABEL [SESSION_LABEL ...]] Do not include 'ses-', when listing the specific session to include. If left blank, will run on all sessions.

stages.default: PreFreeSurfer FreeSurfer PostFreeSurfer fMRIVolume fMRISurface Diffusion
stages.description: Space-separated list of processes to run, e.g., [PostFreeSurfer fMRIVolume Diffusion]

stats_only_struct.description: If hcpstruct_zip is available because of previous, valid run, skip straight to the aseg.csv creation. (No FreeSurfer/PostFreeSurfer processing.)

subject.description: Subject ID (use to override session subject id)

task_label.description: [TASK_LABEL [TASK_LABEL ...]] Do not include 'task-', when listing the specific task to include. If left blank, will run all tasks.

template_size.description: Voxel size of HCP anatomical template. Best if matches input. (Options = 0.7mm, 0.8mm (default), 1mm)

temporal_filter.description: HCP default is 200. Change value, if another is desired.

unwarp_dir_struct.description: Readout direction for structural scans ( 'x', 'x-', 'y', 'y-', 'z', 'z-' ). HCP default = 'z'

processing-mode.description: Control HCP-Pipeline mode, (HCPStyleData): require T2w and fieldmap modalities, (LegacyStyleData): always ignore T2w and fieldmaps, use T2w and/or fieldmaps if available

gear-writable-dir.description: Gears expect to be able to write temporary files in /flywheel/v0/.  If this location is not writable (such as when running in Singularity), this path will be used instead.  fMRIPrep creates a large number of files so this disk space should be fast and local.

slurm-cpu.description: [SLURM] How many cpu-cores to request per command/task. This is used for the underlying '--cpus-per-task' option. If not running on HPC, then this flag is ignored

slurm-ram.description: [SLURM] How much RAM to request. This is used for the underlying '--mem-per-cpu' option. If not running on HPC, then this flag is ignored

slurm-ntasks.description: [SLURM] Total number of tasks/commands across all nodes (not equivalent to neuroimaging tasks). Using a value greater than 1 for code that has not been parallelized will not improve performance (and may break things).

slurm-nodes.description: [SLURM] How many HPC nodes to run on

slurm-partition.description: [SLURM] Blanca, Alpine, or Summit partitions can be entered

slurm-qos.description: [SLURM] For Blanca the QOS has a different meaning, ie blanca-ics vs blanca-ibg, etc. For Alpine and Summit, the QOS should be set to normal if running a job for 1 day or less, and set to long if running a job with a maximum walltime of 7 days

slurm-account.description: [SLURM] For Blanca the ACCOUNT should be set to the sub-account of choice (e.g. blanca-ics-rray). For Alpine, the account should be set to ucb-general, or the specialized account granted by RC: ucb278_asc1

slurm-time.description: [SLURM] Maximum walltime requested after which your job will be cancelled if it hasn't finished. Default to 1 day

description: (HPC Compatible) Runs the preprocessing steps of the Human Connectome Project Minimal Preprocessing Pipeline, described in Glasser et al. 2013. Currently this includes v4.3.0 release of PreFreeSurfer, FreeSurfer, and PostFreeSurfer pipelines. This Gear also generates some helpful QC images.

bidsignore.description: A .bidsignore file to provide to the bids-validator that this gear runs before running the main command.

gdcoeffs.description: Path to gradient coefficients file. If gdcoeffs not past, nonlinear gradient correction skipped.

hcpstruct_zip.description: Path to previous HCP Structural analysis files. Req'd if completing func and/or diff stages only (i.e. should be used in combination with correct stages).

label: BIDS-HCP Preprocessing Pipeline
name: bids-hcp
